definition: namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
equivalent to 就可以/can then (do sth)/can immediately (do sth)/(do sth) and that will suffice
this or that very day/in the next few days
could happen at any moment/on the verge
lit. to be together from the first beat (idiom)/to hit it off/to click together/to chime in easily

sentences.english: Commodity money takes the form of a commodity with intrinsic value.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣本身即具備某種固有財貨的價值。

sentences.english: The sophisticated system destroys enemy warheads through direct "hit-to-kill" technology. "It's like hitting a bullet with a bullet," Watkins says.
sentences.chinese: 系統利用命中即摧毀技術，摧毀敵方的彈頭。

sentences.english: Mix master it, that is mastered exclamatory point.
sentences.chinese: 掌握它的搭配，即掌握了感嘆句的重點。

sentences.english: Kim So-yeon is an actress who exudes both innocence and confidence.
sentences.chinese: 金素妍是一個即天真又自信的女演員。

sentences.english: You can adjust for that by using made-up conversion rates known as Purchasing Power Parities , or PPPs.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用取得的轉換率，即購買力平價對其進行調整。

sentences.english: Crowning "stars" among literary upstarts is killing them.
sentences.chinese: 把所謂“明星”捧做文唐袈貴即是抹殺他們。

sentences.english: The issue of the conflict isn't as black and white from the lens of the priest in the temple.
sentences.chinese: 廟方祭師認爲，衝突不能用非黑即白兩分法論斷。

sentences.english: Alkenes have one or more double bonds between carbon atoms, where two pairs of electrons are shared.
sentences.chinese: 鏈烯有一個或多個共價鍵，即碳原子分享兩對電子。

sentences.english: This is a Desert Wheatear for me, a fresh female.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這是一隻剛換羽的漠即鳥母鳥。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, ceramics product can is classified into two categories: practical and artistic.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，陶瓷產品可以分爲兩類，即。

sentences.english: And joint state-private ownership was one way led to the goal.
sentences.chinese: “公私合營”即是達成這個任務的一種手段。

sentences.english: The executable that is hand-loaded and executed by the Kernel, namely the file server.
sentences.chinese: 手動載入並由內核執行的可執行體，即文件服務器。

sentences.english: "Lo River Map" is one of his classic masterpiece.
sentences.chinese: 《洛神賦圖》即爲他的經典代表作之一。

sentences.english: We design the backbone of the application -- the architecture.
sentences.chinese: 我們設計應用程序的骨架，即架構。

sentences.english: Each tooth has a space, the so-called pulp cavity.
sentences.chinese: 我們每顆牙齒裏面都有一個空間，即所謂的牙髓腔。

definition: to be considered to be/to be defined to be/to be called
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
therefore/as a result/thus/and as a result, ...
in a nutshell/to put it briefly
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
